Text:
Works great! I tried one USB flash drive and it didn't work and I tried a different one and it worked perfect.

Just drag the folder PS3 to flash drive.
On PS3 go to THEME SETTINGS> THEME> INSTALL
Click on the theme you want (from the flash drive)
Install.

Works great, thanks.

Nice! Worked well for me.
Very cool.
u r d man! :) Thank you
worked a treat, note, put the entire folder on your usb, including the PS3 folder, thanks maniac..
Heavy Rain Dynamic Theme: My most wanted theme on PSN. Thanx a lot!
